attributes.action: Impose tougher sentences on people who carry knives and guns in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we all have to walk down the street in fear of being stabbed or shot? people who carry these weapons get away with MURDER. if you carry a knife you should be sent to prison for 6 months minimum, carry a gun and 1 year minimum. no questions asked. if the courts do this people wont carry these weapons. and those who did wont think twice. clamp down hard know with no second chance and crime like this will be reduced dramatically. don’t bother with the slap on the wrist approach IT DOESENT WORK. i should know.. HELP ME SAVE LIVES AND SIGHN THIS PETITION
